title: Marketing Communication Intern (Havaianas)
descJob:
Kanmo Group is looking for an enthusiastic marketing intern to join our marketing department. This person will provide creative ideas to assist our Marketing Communication team as well as perform administration duties in implementing marketing strategies.
This internship will help you broaden your marketing skills and implement what you have got during your University study. Ultimately, you also gain a lot of experience in very fast paced work environment in Retail Industry.
What will you do:

Perform market analysis and research on competition
Support the marketing team in daily administrative tasks
Assist in marketing and advertising promotional activities (e.g. social media, direct mail and web)
Prepare promotional presentations
Help distribute marketing materials
Help organize marketing events

Requirements:
1. Bachelor Degree in any major (Preferably : Marketing Major)
2. Strong Self Leadership
3. English language
4. Enthusiast with Mom and Kids brand
Department
Brand Management
Role
Havaianas
Locations
Head Office

title: Product Marketing Intern - Commerce Enablement
descJob:
Location
Jakarta
Work Type
Internship
Application Posted
February 23, 2022
About the Role
If you’re looking to be a part of a dynamic team and learn about B2B marketing, joining as a Product Marketing Intern will be a place for you! As an intern, you will have an opportunity to explore a lot of tools that we usually use to manage our communication to merchants, create a campaign, and also analyze the result to make sure that our campaign has a direct impact on business. You will work closely with Product Marketing, Creative Team, and also Product Team with this role.
What You Will Do
Support Product Marketing Manager to drive the awareness and engagement of products and features launches
Develop a content plan across channels based on the campaign strategy with a high-quality performance of the A/B testing mindset to drive product growth
Manage all communication blast across products and ensure alignment with the communication blast governance
Lead the visual references on the development of creative assets to drive higher engagement results towards the product’s growth
Set up all communication activities across CRM channels such as email marketing, SMS, WhatsApp blast, web notification, and ensure excellent execution
Work together with internal stakeholders in designing automation lead flow with a personalized approach, engaging copy, captivating audio-visual contents, and team with outside sources to produce an engaging experience that increases lead conversion
Identify all launch activities and collaborate with internal marketing stakeholders for output deliverables
Create a post-campaign report which consists of four key factors (business, channel, content, and journey learnings) to improve the next campaign results
What You Will Need
Final Semester or Fresh Graduate majoring in Management, Communication, Linguistics, or any other related fields
Excellent communication (verbal and written) in English and Bahasa, having copywriting portfolio would be a plus point
Keep abreast of latest visual design trend in order to construct ad material briefs
Confident to communicate with cross-functional team
Available for at least 3 months full-time internship
About the Team
Selly Product Marketing Team consists of 3 people that mostly located in Jakarta, but don’t worry we are an expert in working remotely. Selly Product Marketing Team handles the end-to-end acquisition and retention strategy for Selly, starting from performance marketing, merchant communication, CRM, brand strategy to merchant education. Yes! There are no sales in Selly and all the acquisition and retention would be part of product marketing team.
Selly Product Marketing Team is part of the bigger group called Merchant Marketing Team where we always have internal bonding activities monthly, quarterly, and semesterly. You will meet more than 60++ talented people from various backgrounds and learn so much from them. Psst…. We have a lot of internal workshops & training sessions as well.

title: Business Development and Partnerships - ShopeeMall Marketing...
descJob:
DepartmentBusiness Development and Partnerships
LevelExperienced (Individual Contributor)
LocationIndonesia - Jakarta
The Business Development and Partnerships teams at Shopee are dynamic and energetic. The teams are always looking to acquire business opportunities to drive Shopee to be the No. 1 e-commerce platform in Southeast Asia and Taiwan. The aim of the Business Development and Partnership teams is to provide Shopee’s buyers with a wide variety of product listings at the best prices. Browse our Business Development and Partnerships team openings to see how you can make an impact with us.
Job Description:
Manage ShopeeMall brand accounts by driving, tracking and monitoring their integrated digital marketing performance
Conduct deep-dive data analysis and campaign performance reporting and handle presentations and reviews for external sellers meetings and internal management meetings
Identify opportunities and grow adoption of Shopee Marketing Solutions from assigned ShopeeMall brands.
Act as the main liaison officer and consultant for assigned ShopeeMall brands in troubleshooting and optimizing the digital marketing performance to give the most optimal return on investment (ROI)
Meet the KPI target of achieving the amount of marketing dollars sellers spent and adoption of Shopee Marketing Solutions and getting the agreed ROI at seller level
Manage end-to-end service delivery process of Shopee Marketing Solutions for assigned ShopeeMall brands
Requirements:
Candidate possesses minimum of 4 years of work experience either in digital agencies, digital technology companies or e-commerce industry, or has passion in the e-commerce industry.
Bachelor’s Degree in Marketing, Management or related disciplines from recognized universities.
Strong attention to detail and follow-up as well as fast turn-around working style is required
Ability to multi-task across different levels of granularity, meet deadline and thrive in a fast-paced environment
Great stakeholder management across internal and external stakeholders
Desired experience in marketing presentations, project management, data analyses, and/or digital campaign management
Self-driven and a team player

title: Healthcare Nutrition Marketing
descJob:
About the job
As part of Healthcare Nutrition team to lead Healthcare Nutrition channel to achieve the company's vision, desired sales, market share, brand result objectives and brand image
Accelerate portfolio performance and market share
Refines brand positioning and communication strategy
Develop strategy to increase category awareness and penetration for sales and team to achieve company's target
Generate insight and renovation programs to drive the business
Work closely with internal stakeholder to understand the sales channel as well as the supply chain to approve and ensure delivery forecast
Align with Global team on brand strategy and communication
Ability to understand the market and influence people
About you
Ability to integrate competencies from departments to deliver results
Aggressive commercial approach and strong analytical skills to understand strength and weakness of the business
Possess strong interpersonal skill and communication skill both verbal and written to be able to influence stakeholders and KOL
Understand Healthcare system and have good understanding in KOL Management
Experience in healthcare business approach and community
Solid nutrition product and market knowledge
About us
Danone's mission is bringing health through food to as many people as possible and we want to invite people to join the movement for a healthier world. We recognize the power people have to impact the world through their daily choices. Each time we eat and drink, we vote for the world we want to live in. We believe a healthy body needs healthy food, and healthy food needs a healthy planet and this is what our new signature One Planet One Health embodies.

title: Marketing Communication - AquaEasy
descJob:
Company Description
AquaEasy (a Bosch company) is the best AI platform for Aquaculture. We welcome talents to join a cross functional high energy team, developing IoT solutions revolutionizing the industry. We want to make history with you, transforming aquaculture from art to science and to feed the world of tomorrow

Job Description

Collaborates with sales or marketing representatives to fully understand product and communication needs
Gathers the materials necessary to understand the project and competition in the area such as literature or previous marketing campaigns; analyzes these materials to determine the most effective communications technique
Based on assessment, drafts, and proposes campaigns, which may include social and online media, print media, direct mail, and other multimedia
Creates and coordinates campaign, design ideas, content recommendation, and brand activity to marketing team
Schedules and develops content (social media, print media, direct mail, etc.), filming (scripts and production)
Evaluates success of campaigns when completed
Attends trade shows and community fairs and staffs the company booth
Execute tests, collect, and analyze data, identify trends and insights in order to achieve maximum ROI in paid search campaigns
Track, report, and analyze all media analytics
Research and analyze competitor
Performs other duties as assigned when necessary

Qualifications

At least bachelor degree in Marketing, Communications, or similar major
Minimum 1 year of experience as Marketing Communication or similar role
Excellent verbal and written communication skills, in Bahasa and English that may include public speaking and presentation
Excellent organizational skills and attention to detail
Excellent time management skills with a proven ability to meet deadlines
Strong analytical, critical thinker and problem-solving skills
Ability to analyze data and provide evidence-based recommendations
Sense of ownership and pride in your performance and its impact on company’s success
Up to date with the latest trends and best practices in marketing
Experience with marketing analytics tools (e.g., Google Analytics, SEMrush, brandwatch, etc.)
Additional Information
https://www.aquaeasy.life/

title: Trainee - Marketing Communication
descJob:
Trainee - Marketing Communication
Date: 08-Mar-2022
Service Line / Portfolios: Marketing
Location:
Jakarta, ID
What impact will you make?

At Deloitte, we offer a unique and exceptional career experience to inspire and empower talents like you to make an impact that matters for our clients, people and community. Whatever your aspirations, Deloitte offers you a highly inclusive, collaborative workplace and unrivalled opportunities to realize your full potential. We are always looking for people with the relentless energy to push themselves further, and to find new avenues and unique ways to reach our shared goals.

So what are you waiting for? Join the winning team now.

Work you’ll do
The successful candidate will work closely with Deloitte Indonesia Clients & Markets, Communication Team, and primarily will be involved in module creation of Deloitte CSR Program (WorldClass) and other communication-related tasks. The detail job description is as follow :
Developed and implemented Deloitte CSR program(WorldClass ), assisting in the creation training module/program as well as liaised with internal and external collaborators to implement WorldClass program in Indonesia.
Digital communication implementation, to schedule social media content and assisting to deliver competitive review.
Media Relations, involves in working with media for the purpose of informing Deloitte's current news and publications.
Branding and communications implementation, assisting to create promotion content based on template given.

Requirements

We're looking for a team player who could adaptable in fast-pace working environment.

Majoring in Communication studies is preferable.
Last year university student and fresh graduate are welcome.
Enthusiast in social impact initiatives.
Savvy to operate Microsoft Office software (Power Point, Excel, Words, etc).
Interest in Digital Communication content production.

Due to volume of applications, we regret only shortlisted candidates will be notified. Candidates will only be contacted by authorized Deloitte Recruiters via firm’s business contact number or business email address.


Requisition ID: 73305
In Indonesia, the services are provided by Imelda & Rekan and other related entities in Indonesia ("Deloitte in Indonesia"), which are affiliates of Deloitte Southeast Asia Ltd. Deloitte Southeast Asia Ltd is a member firm of Deloitte Touche Tohmatsu Limited. Deloitte in Indonesia, which is within the Deloitte Network, is the entity that is providing this Website.

title: Junior Graphic Designer
descJob:
Location
Jakarta
Work Type
Permanent
Application Posted
March 4, 2022
About the Role
At Gojek, we see graphic design as intelligence made visual storytelling that engages, motivates, and inspires. We are looking for a Graphic Designer who will play a key role in supporting the Brand Partnership – Brand Building team.
This role involves a creative mind, attention to detail, with hands-on skills in the Adobe Creative Suite, communication skills, as well as demonstrates your passion and enthusiasm for design. Collaborating with multiple teams, you should be able to take direction from written or spoken ideas and convert them into a design that connects.
You will be responsible for the shaping of our visual aspects across channels, to bring a strong and distinctive brand experience specifically for Gojek AdTech & PromoTech, while closely working within our branding guidelines. Your efforts will directly impact and fortify the meaningful visual communication for Gojek’s Brand Partnership.

What You Will Do
Work on a wide range of projects and media to visualize innovative designs that meet business goals. They include in-app banners, digital & online assets, events collateral, slide templates, vehicle wrap designs, video creation for marketing and social media distribution, and more.
Create, layout, and revise deliverables in accordance with brand guidelines.
Work independently and cooperatively on multiple projects with the Brand Partnership team, meeting deadlines, and scheduling project execution based on workload.
Update, create and maintain internal illustration assets to ease the execution of design for the Brand Partnership team.
What You Will Need
Bachelor’s degree in Graphic Design or related fields from reputable universities
At least 1-2 years experience in graphic design. Proficient in design software, mainly Adobe Creative Suite (Illustrator, Photoshop, InDesign, and After Effects).
Strong understanding of key visual elements and aesthetics, with attention to detail.
Strong time management skills to manage multiple projects.
Strong communication skills and can clearly articulate ideas, designs, and suggestions.
A proven portfolio that demonstrates design skills and creative thinking.

About the Team
Our Brand Partnership team consists of three teams, Industry Managers, Campaign Management & Sales Support, and Brand Building, which report to the Global VP of Brand & Agency Partnerships. As Graphic Designer, you will be in the Brand Building team and an active member of the Brand Partnership team.
Brand building plays a long game – it breathes life into every turn of the business day after day. What the Brand Building team does is help and provide support to the Brand Partnership team in optimizing strategic partnership efforts and delivering commercial growth. We do that by implementing brand and communications strategy to shape the reputation, drive visibility, maintain brand integrity, and boost the relevance in the Ad & Promo Tech field.
What drives us is our shared sense of creating impact on the Brands’ businesses, and by doing so, helping Gojek generate growth that will enable Gojek to sustainably produce an even greater and scalable impact on the society.
For all that hard work, we place self-care and personal development on top of the list. With work-from-home altering the dynamics of our work-life balance, we believe it’s central to foster trust, have fun in the process, and send each other food and coffee – or, most of the time, share dad jokes and memes we discover on the internet world.

title: Digital Marketing Intern
descJob:
Company Description
At Bosch, we care. For you, our business, and our environment.
Let’s turn visions into reality. At Bosch, we shape the future by inventing high-quality technologies and services that spark enthusiasm and enrich people’s lives. Our areas of activity are every bit as diverse as our outstanding Bosch teams around the world. Their creativity is the key to innovation through connected living, mobility or industry. Our responsibility goes far beyond business. We’re independent of stock markets and bound to the purpose of the Robert Bosch Foundation; our success directly benefits society, the environment, and future generations. Our promise to our associates is rock-solid: we grow together, we enjoy our work, and we inspire each other. Join in and feel the difference.
Work #LikeABosch

Job Description

Content creation (Storyboard, video & photo shooting, directing, editing, & final cut)
Handle digital marketing and Manage social media activities (Create scheduling, creating contents and execute to analyze them) through marketing planning tool.
Assist marketing in rolling out global marketing campaign and to country level, include the design of marketing visual aids.
Assist with organizing offline marketing activities (events and exhibitions).
Merchandising and work with external party and purchasing for marketing aids.

Qualifications

Undergraduate Students (min S1, pursuing master degree is an advantage) Preferably majoring in Communication/Electrical/Mechanical/ Graphic Design/Marketing.
Willing to work minimum of 6 months for this internship.
Proficient in utilizing design & film editing software (Adobe package, inkscape, etc)
Excellent written and verbal communication in Bahasa and English is a must.
Willing to learn, proactive, and work with enthusiasm.
Additional Information

Open for COLLEGE STUDENTS ONLY
Full-time paid internship for 6 months
